Class VARConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>

          com.versant.var.common.VARConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map
public class VARConfiguration
extends java.util.Hashtable

Represents the configuration - basically a repository of all configurable parameters.

MAX_RESTARTS

public static final java.lang.String MAX_RESTARTS
Maximum number of restarts. If any of the moules fail then the driver attempts to restart that module for this configurable number of times before giving up and logging an error.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

REQUEST_RETRY_INTERVAL

public static final java.lang.String REQUEST_RETRY_INTERVAL
Request retry interval. Determines how frequently the request processor polls the database to get the next transaction replication request. It is specified in seconds. TO DO : change to seconds
